subject: Replace Firebase auth with Supabase and add Tailwind/Shadcn UI
body:
Phase 1 implementation complete:
- Swap Firebase auth for Supabase Google OAuth
- Add SupabaseAuthManager implementing IAuthManager interface
- Create OAuth callback route at /auth/callback
- Remove FCM push notification code (to be reimplemented later)
- Install and configure Tailwind CSS v4 with custom dark theme
- Set up Shadcn/ui with Button and Card components
- Add Shell layout component
- Update documentation with session progress

User action required: Configure Google OAuth in Supabase Dashboard

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
